message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair and simple start!
I'll give you 400k, but I think I deserve more for being the one to make the next offer!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I still think I deserve more. You can't have it all, Bob!
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think I deserve more considering the decreasing value of the money due to inflation.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not willing to give up too much. Let's meet in the middle!
